name: Gridiron (itch) (aaronjackson3203)
description:
My entry for the 2021 Epic Megajam. Defend against waves of drones trying to kill you and destroy the grid you're standing on, and make you run out of space.

I noticed after the jam was over that the game crashes if any of the green robots run into you or if the boss successfully shoots you. :(

For anyone wanting to play the working version, the link is here https://www.dropbox.com/s/f3c5lmia7gy0l6y/AaronJackson3203_Gridiron.zip?dl=0
